name: Backseat Beebow
description:
Welcome to Beebow! An action packed platformer following the adventures of the mighty Beebow! But... You aren't  playing Beebow, your little sister is! You can tell her what to do, but it may take her a moment to do it. If you tell her another command quickly after the first she
responds faster! But she will also get angry...
Good Luck!
